## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4634f9dee93f806a074705a1dcdcb30d630fa3a68ea61bc2c2d4e9a9510128af)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'elf-stats-cocoa-ribbon-476' @ 3.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
